text: I want to migrate my site to HubSpot. I have a blog under "<http://blog.mydomain.com|blog.mydomain.com>" . I want to use "<http://mydomain.com/blog|mydomain.com/blog>" and host my blog inside HubSpot. Where do I handle the redirects for "<http://blog.mydomain.com|blog.mydomain.com>"  when my site is ready to go live?
You can add the redirection under Settings - > Domains and URL's
